document.discussion_title: Detention Deputy - Summit County Sheriff's Office
document.topic_text: Detention Deputy Job - Summit County Sheriff's Office - Breckenridge, Colorado April 25, 2016 Position Title: Detention Deputy Position Type: Civilian Closing Date: 5/6/2016 Job Description The Summit County Detention Facility is a dynamic and energetic 94 bed facility with an average daily population of 57 inmates. We are looking for professional, out going people who have a great sense of humor, excellent communication and customer service skills, and who possess above average attention to detail. Candidates must be prepared to undertake all detentions related job duties, from bookings to transports, court duties to extraditions. Colorado POST certification is not required . Successful applicants will be trained in arrest control/defensive tactics, firearms, Taser, and Pepper Spray, in addition to over 80 hours of in service training offered annually. Serious applicants are strongly encouraged to contact the on duty sergeant to arrange for a facility tour and ride along. Please visit summitsheriffco.com for more information. Additional Information This position offers medical, dental, and life insurance. Job Requirements Education High School or equivalent Experience No experience necessary Entry Level Salary: $3244 monthly Contact Information
